## RumInitConfiguration.compressIntakeRequests property

Compress requests sent to the Datadog intake to reduce bandwidth usage when sending large amounts of data. The compression is done in a Worker thread. See \[Content Security Policy guidelines\](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/content\_security\_policy\_logs/?tab=firefox\#use-csp-with-real-user-monitoring-and-session-replay) for further information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
compressIntakeRequests?: boolean | undefined;
```
